Cherwell Property is proud to present this Incomparable  spacious 1 Bedroom apartment investment in Masdar City
Unit Feature:

- Modern high standard kitchen

- Concierge service
- Mosque
- Restaurants
- Shops
About the Project :
Initiated in 2008, Masdar is the emirate’s pioneering vision of a city of the future. With the goal of becoming the world’s most sustainable eco-city, Masdar is leading the way by developing a “greenprint” for how cities can accommodate rapid urbanisation and dramatically reduce energy, water and waste. The city combines ancient Arabic architectural techniques with modern technology and is built around a huge central Arabic wind tunnel that channels a cooling breeze through the streets and alleys making it comfortable to stroll around even during high summer temperatures.']

location1: ['Jumeirah Living Marina GateDubai, Dubai Marina, Marina Gate']
amenities:
['Unfurnished
Balcony

descriptions:
["DescriptionLUXHABITAT is glad to present this brand new luxury 2 bedroom apartment in Jumeirah Living Marina Gate. This apartment features views of the swimming pool, community and skyline. 
The project will be handed over in the second quarter of 2020 and it features a convenient payment plan:
-10% down payment
-10% in 3 months 
-30% upon handover
-50% for 4 years post - handover 
- 4% Dubai Land Department registration fee - waived 
The facade of the building is contemporary and has modern interiors to match. Each apartment is designed to maximise indoor space with double-height ceilings, spacious balconies and floor to ceiling windows. The modern vertical lines of the facade mesh well with the inspiring interiors. The views from each apartment are breath-taking, ranging from the Dubai city skyline to the beautiful yachts by the jetties. As soon as you step outside the building, you would find yourself in the exciting Marina Walk and enjoy a stroll by the water's edge. Also located close by is The Walk at Jumeirah Beach Residence. Amenities for residents include a temperature-controlled infinity pool overlooking the marina including a children's pool and play area, a two-level gym overlooking the marina with separate changing facilities for men and women, including a steam room and sauna, and squash and tennis courts. For speed and convenience, there are seven high-speed elevators and a dedicated service elevator with a loading dock for residents."]

descriptions:
['DescriptionBeautiful 3 bedroom apartment is available. Located on a Mid floor, this is the perfect home for anyone who wishes to live by in Palm Jumeirah.
Large open plan living and dining room 
Jash Hamad
3 Bed Rooms
Type C
Size 2210 sqft
Balcony
Vacant
Palm Jumeirah is a man made residential island community built in the shape of a palm tree; its fronds cater to exclusive villas with private beaches, while its trunk houses apartment towers, low-rise buildings and hotel apartments generally attracting families to the villas and singles or couples to the apartments. There are good public transport links including bus routes, Palm Monorail and water taxis, with private taxes present at the many hotels, spas and beach resorts. There are plans to have retail spaces located around the island in a style similar to The Walk at JBR allowing visitors and residents to be more mobile on foot as they shop closer to home. Most of the developments are built with quality finishes and facilities including state-of-the-art gyms, pools and lazy rivers plus access to spas, beaches and fine dining outlets.']

The new owner of this incredible brand new and fully furnished Umm Al Sheif mansion will have the honor and pride to call this their home. No detail has been spared with the European high quality of construction and finishing materials.
The grand entrance will give you the feeling that you're walking into a 5-star hotel. Seven-metre high ceiling boasting lots of natural light. Welcome your guests to the grand majlis area which has its own private entrance or entertain them in the open kitchen concept.

Take your private lift up to the master bedroom that has a spacious sitting area, a large walk-through wardrobe leading you to your spa-like bathroom. These are just some of the few features this mansion has to offer.
This rare mansion is a must see - must have, book your private tour today."]

["DescriptionBerkshire Hathaway HomeServices Gulf Properties is proud to present for sale, this immaculately kept six-bedroom Villa at Emirates Hills. Water features and a landscaped lush wrap-around garden further compliment this beautiful family home nestled in the privacy of its own surrounds. Full lake views from the front garden.
Built over two floors with an internal lift and sweeping staircase, this home offers an easy flow between the very large living rooms, dining room and open-plan custom built kitchen that is made up with rich wooden cabinetry. A large colonial sized front veranda looks out over a sparkling swimming pool and a very private detached entertainment area with bbq and bar counter that all adds to the appeal of this stunning home.

- 9,470 Sqft Built Up Area

Plot size of 18,922 sq.ft. with built-up area over 9,461 sq.ft. Five bedrooms all en-suite are located upstairs with a guest room en-suite or private gymnasium on the ground level. Garage and additional under cover parking provide ample space for 6 cars. Maid's and driver’s rooms both en-suite have their own separate entrance. 
Call our Specialist on +971504127168 to find out more about this Luxury Villa."]
